OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD FUTURES AND CONNEXIONS - THE HUB

Desc.entry: Aimed at young people of African-Caribbean, dual heritage, Yemeni and Somali descent aged 13-19 years citywide. Promotes black awareness by working with young people to develop cultural and educational programmes. Activities at the centre include a youth club, counselling and welfare rights. The centre has a library. Runs a summer activities programme in July/August, a Black History Month in October and participates in National Youth Work Week in November and also February and October half-term programmes. Runs post 16 drop-in, "Positive Me".

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Thurs 10am-5pm, Fri 10am-4.30pm (office); Tues & Thurs 6.30-9.30pm (youth clubs), Wed 5.30-8.30pm (youth club)
